name: ShieldDash
description:
Controls

Movement: WASD

Dash: Left click

Shield: Right click

Dash through enemies to destroy them! Absorb projectiles with your shield to regain health, the more you have the farther you can dash away.

This is my first time working on a game (friday was my first time opening unity, lol) but I think that the main mechanic turned out okay. I'm gonna keep expanding on it once judging is done.
